oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George Peabody College for Teachers, Nashville, Tenn., between 1920 and 1939
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color postcard of buildings on the campus of the George Peabody College for Teachers, circa the 1930s. The six buildings depicted on the postcard include the Library, West Dormitory, Social-Religious Building, Jesup Psychological Laboratory, Demonstration School, and Industrial Arts Building. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: George Peabody College for Teachers
